input{height:60px;width:100%;font-size:18px;padding-inline:5px;border:none;border-bottom:4px solid var(--clr-bg-blanco);outline:none;background-color:transparent;margin-bottom:3rem;color:var(--clr-text-light)}.input__field input:focus{border-color:var(--clr-accent-color)}input:-webkit-autofill,input:-webkit-autofill:active,input:-webkit-autofill:focus,input:-webkit-autofill:hover{-webkit-background-clip:text;-webkit-text-fill-color:var(--clr-text-light)!important}input:focus~label,input:valid~label{top:-10px;font-size:16px;color:var(--clr-accent-color)}.input__field label{position:absolute;top:30%;left:5px;transform:translateY(-50%);font-size:18px;color:var(--clr-text-light);pointer-events:none;transition:all .3s ease}.textarea__field textarea{height:120px;width:100%;background-color:transparent;border:4px solid var(--clr-bg-blanco);color:var(--clr-text-light);border-radius:10px}.textarea__field label{margin-bottom:1.5rem;position:absolute;top:20%;left:12px;transform:translateY(-50%);font-size:18px;color:var(--clr-text-light);pointer-events:none;transition:all .3s ease;border:none}textarea:focus~label{top:-16px;left:6px;font-size:16px;color:var(--clr-accent-color)}.hide--mobile{display:none}@media (min-width:768px){.hide{display:none}}.hide--main-nav{display:none}@media (min-width:768px){.show{display:block}}@media (min-width:768px){.show--flex{display:flex}}
